product_name: Bored Feet Press Redwood Hikes Bay Area Topographic Trail Map - Carquinez Strait and Berkeley Hills
long_description: The Redwood Hikes Bay Area topographic trail map covers the myriad of trails and topography of Carquinez Strait and Berkeley Hills in vivid, easy-to-read detail.
